data.title: Boaz Yakin
data.text:
Fresh - I'm Gonna Be Rich

What starts out as simple flirting ends with a braggadocious conversation about cars. In this scene: Fresh (Sean Nelson), Rosie (Natima Bradley)

Fresh - Official Trailer (HD)

Disenchanted by the harsh realities of life in the city, a smart, streetwise kid nicknamed Fresh strives to create a better future for himself and his family. Fighting back in the only way he knows how, Fresh defies the odds by staying one move ahead of the local criminals in a dangerous game of survival.

Fresh - Things Fall Apart

Esteban's reign over Nichole and Fresh comes to a shocking end. In this scene: Esteban (Giancarlo Esposito), Nichole (N'Bushe Wright), Fresh (Sean Nelson), Lt. Perez (Jose Zuniga)

Fresh - This Ain't Checkers

Sam can tell that Fresh's head isn't in the game. In this scene: Sam (Samuel L. Jackson), Fresh (Sean Nelson)

From Dusk Till Dawn 2 - Banco Bravo

While the police surround the outside of the bank, the worst of Buck and the gang's troubles may actually be on the inside. In this scene: Buck (Robert Patrick), Jesus (Raymond Cruz), Luther (Duane Whitaker), Ray Bob (Brett Harrelson), C.W. (Muse Watson), Sheriff Lawson (Bo Hopkins)

From Dusk Till Dawn 2 - Car Trouble

When a stranded Luther finally catches a ride to the El Coyote Motel, his driver takes a detour which leaves him wishing he had walked instead. In this scene: Luther (Duane Whitaker), Razor Eddie (Danny Trejo)

From Dusk Till Dawn 2 - Don't Cross Buck

Buck finds himself trapped and alone, trying to escape both the clutches of the police and his former friends. In this scene: Buck (Robert Patrick), Jesus (Raymond Cruz), Luther (Duane Whitaker), Ray Bob (Brett Harrelson), C.W. (Muse Watson), Sheriff Lawson (Bo Hopkins)

From Dusk Till Dawn 2 - Escapee

When notorious criminal Luther escapes from custody, the police turn to his old buddy, Buck, to find out his whereabouts. In this scene: Buck (Robert Patrick), Sheriff Lawson (Bo Hopkins), Luther (Duane Whitaker)

From Dusk Till Dawn 2 - Get Out of There

The vamps are picking off the police force, one by one. In this scene: Buck (Robert Patrick), Jesus (Raymond Cruz), Luther (Duane Whitaker), Ray Bob (Brett Harrelson), C.W. (Muse Watson), Sheriff Lawson (Bo Hopkins)

From Dusk Till Dawn 2 - It's On

The team road-trips down to Mexico to prepare for the heist. In this scene: Buck (Robert Patrick), Ray Bob (Brett Harrelson), Jesus (Raymond Cruz), C.W. (Muse Watson), Luther (Duane Whitaker)

From Dusk Till Dawn 2 - Luther's Way

A lot about Luther's changed. And although he's promised to keep his team looped in on his plan, he's keeping a few of the heist's more bloody details to himself. In this scene: Luther (Duane Whitaker), Buck (Robert Patrick), Ray Bob (Brett Harrelson), C.W. (Muse Watson), Jesus (Raymond Cruz)

From Dusk Till Dawn 2 - More For Us

The bank heist goes awry when Luther's secret "condition" is revealed. In this scene: Buck (Robert Patrick), Jesus (Raymond Cruz), Luther (Duane Whitaker), Ray Bob (Brett Harrelson), C.W. (Muse Watson)

From Dusk Till Dawn 2 - Official Trailer (HD)

A veteran criminal planning a major bank robbery, Buck (Robert Patrick) assembles a team to pull off the heist. When the fugitive Luther (Duane Whitaker) travels to meet the crew in Mexico, he unexpectedly ends up near a bar in the middle of the desert and gets turned into a vampire by one of the establishment's fang-sporting regulars. Before long, Luther joins his fellow felons at the bank, but his newfound blood-sucking ways result in plenty of fierce human and vampire conflict.
